text: <https://algiel.wixsite.com/algiel> this is my portfolio but its in creation >< I guess you can give me some opinions to get better, I still need to add a couple of videos
Thanks for sending your work in progress over Maria! I will check it out with a coffee at lunch

Great start! I like that you've dived into character modeling with your Shivara model. It's clear that you've looked into various references which is great. Was this for a module at SAE? Two suggestions I have are: 1. Instead of wireframe mode for turntables, try  using wireframe on shaded as your model will be easier to appreciate this way. 2. The easiest way to improve how professional your model looks would be to add "normal" and "specular" maps, to give you really nice control over the shading of the model. Just some ideas, should they be helpful!

As I'm sure you know (as you've put them on your website) showing your creative process, including going from sketches/concept to 3d model and then lit/posed model in an environment is a great way for potential employers to know that you understand the whole process. So keep it up!
